title: Honoring Randolph High School Girls Volleyball Team upon the occasion of its designation for special recognition
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  honoring  the Randolph Central High School Lady
Cardinals Girls Volleyball Team upon the occasion  of  winning  the  New
York State Public High School Athletic Association Class D Championship

WHEREAS,  It  is  the  intent  of this Legislative Body to recognize and
honor outstanding high school athletic teams  that  have  exhibited  the
teamwork, commitment and drive to succeed in statewide athletic competi-
tions in this great Empire State; and
  WHEREAS, The Randolph Central High School Lady Cardinals Girls Volley-
ball Team has claimed the 2010 New York State Public High School Athlet-
ic Association Class D Title with its win over Haldane Central School on
November 21, 2010; and
  WHEREAS, This talented group of young athletes embodies the true spir-
it  of teamwork in achieving a goal, all while demonstrating the ability
to balance the commitments of academics, family and athletics; and
  WHEREAS, Recognizing the heart, desire and capabilities of this  team,
Coach  Robin  Maycock  encouraged this group of talented players as they
made their dreams of a state championship come true; and
  WHEREAS, The  Lady  Cardinals  Volleyball  Team  relentlessly  pursued
victory  in  interscholastic  play  throughout  the  regular  season and
beyond, with the season-long goal of a state championship title; and
  WHEREAS, In the Class D state championship game against  Haldane,  the
Randolph  Lady  Cardinals played with resolve to find the right strategy
to lead the team to success in achieving its third state title in  seven
years; and
  WHEREAS, This special group of ambitious and dedicated athletes shared
their  victory  with the entire community served by the Randolph Central
School District; and
  WHEREAS, The Randolph Central School Lady  Cardinals  Volleyball  Team
ended  its  season  with  an  overall record of 29-4, culminating in the
state championship title; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
congratulate the Randolph Central School Lady Cardinals Girls Volleyball
Team on its New York State Public High School Athletic Association Class
D Championship; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That copies of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted  to  the Randolph Central School Lady Cardinals Girls Volleyball
Team and to Coach Robin Maycock.
